2025-04-16.title: York VS Staffs
2025-04-16.description: A 6v6 test match between York and Staffs. This served as a test of the Cheep Cheep bot and YouTube streaming. This match was streamed from both team's perspectives on the UMKL YouTube channel. You can watch those archived streams here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA9y6mUhnL26e2DXoc9qfiyOymYX5UWHH

2025-04-26.title: York VS Glasgow
2025-04-26.description: A 6v6 test match between York and Glasgow. This will serve as a test of the Cheep Cheep bot and YouTube streaming. Members of the relevant teams can sign up to compete in this match using the button in the team's announcement channel. This match will be streamed from both team's perspectives on the UMKL YouTube channel. You can visit it here: https://www.youtube.com/@universitymariokartleague
